author: davignon
body:
This PR contains the first version of the Offline DQM for L1T Taus.
The efficiency code is inspired from offline analysis and is based on Tag & Probe on muon+tau events.
The DQM implementation follows the one from L1 EG (Luke Kreczko et al.).
Emulator/unpacked comparisons are available, as well as run harvesting.

Please review and consider for merging.

Cheers,
- Olivier & Ccile
title: First version of the DQMOffline for L1T Taus
